transcript.text:
￼


























Designer Studio

PDF Block Template
Centralized Personalization

1 min
this feature centralizes all the blocks at the left panel on the block template page the centralization is done based on the name of the block if the name of the block is the same on different pages of the template then the content is centrally personalized and the customer only needs to enter data in the field only one time how to enable centralized personalization? how to enable centralized personalization? enable the feature from ‘edit info’ of the pdf block template
Did this page help you?
